comments.body: Is it really a TBranchElement?  TVector3 is not splittable (It has a custom streamer).
Consider (weak recommendation) using a slightly more realistic case by using TH1* and assigning TH1D and TH2D.
would you expect such an example to break when this example does not or vice versa?
I do not expect any behavior differences.  I was thinking it would help future developer take less time understanding/thinking-of the relevance of the test.
